attributes.action: To defer the governments planned rise in the cost of a united kinkdom passport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when this government came to power the cost of a uk passport was £18.00 they are by stealth taxing this vital document the new cost will be £77.00 from september a price out of reach of many of this governments core voters & supporters

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
